0.9.1.name: wordpress/nitwpress
0.9.1.description: NiTwPress is a Twitter client WordPress widget. It displays your twit to the WordPress sidebar with left to right scrolling like Niconico-doga. (NiTwPress is an abbreviation of `NIconico-doga like TWitter client for wordPRESS'.)
